import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { addToCart } from '../actions/cartAction' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Message from '../components/Message' import { Row, Col, ListGroup, Image, Form, Button, Card } from 'react-bootstrap' const CartScreen = ({ match, location, quentity }) => { const productId = match.params.id const qty = location.search ? Number(location.search.split('=')[1]) : 1 const dispatch = useDispatch() const cart = useSelector((state) => state.cart) const { cartItems } = cart console.log(cartItems) useEffect(() => { if (productId) { dispatch(addToCart(productId, qty)) } }, [dispatch, productId, qty]) const removeCartHandeler = (id) => { console.log(id) } return ( <>

{cartItems.length === 0 ? ( Your Cart is Empty Go Back ) : ( {cartItems.map((item) => ( {item.name} â‚¹{item.price} dispatch( addToCart(item.product, Number(e.target.value)) ) } > {[...Array(item.countInStock).keys()].map((x) => ( ))} ))} )} ) } export default CartScreen
